markers.marker: Lore stuff, in short: Anankos is both evil and not evil at the same time because reasons. Mentioning both in the same game might be confusing.
Taking off her armor is quite a hassle for Corrin.
Arthur is a character in FE:Fates, known for his terrible luck.
Big breasts are heavy and might hurt your back later on in life.

Quote "Those books weren't lying!" when a male large crotch is visible. It's been hinted at that Nyx (character in FE:Fates, the one I referenced to about the Strip Poker book in Corrin's other lines) likes reading erotic novels.
Corrin's army camp. She spent quite a bit of time here in between battles.
Quote: "These cards don't match with any of the combos I read about... Maybe it is a hidden one?" When she has a bad hand.
Corrin's sword is basically a magical chainsaw.
"Charlotte Pose" Charlotte is a character in FE:Fates. Her official art has her in an... interesting pose, a pose I tried to recreate as the 6-help pose
Used to continue lines towards Chun-Li.
1-stripped: "Here you go! you can try [my gloves] on if you like, they are really comfy!" Probably doesn't do anything, but hey.
Giant penises are scary, especially kisekae's giant penises. Corrin fears you might be cursed.
Corrin asks if a character is intentionally taking something bigger off.
Followup to the "demstratz" marker.
Corrin can turn into a dragon (well, more like a deer-dragon hybrid), that's basically it.
A dragonstone is needed for Corrin to transform into a dragon.
Used so her 9-finished pose doesn't reappear until the game is over.
Because she gets really competitive in stage 4, Corrin forgets that losers have to masturbate.
Corrin gets really horny when a guy starts masturbating when she's masturbating as well.
Corrin doesn't want people to go easy on her in this game.
Quote "Your ~clothing~? That's a good choice!" After someone takes something off.
Referencing Mitama, a character in FE:Fates who basically only speaks in haiku.
Corrin's army camp has hot springs. The springs are unisex so it's possible (and likely) for you to "accindentally" walk into the springs when members of the opposing gender are bathing.
"Justice is just an illusion" is a quote in FE:Fates, I referenced it.
Corrin comments on Launch's split personality.
responding to corrin_m's presence, "This is so weird... What kind of magic is this?"
Quote: "I'm just going to call this "learning by doing"". When she has a bad hand.
She mentions her shirt in a "good_hand" quote, mentioning it again in a stripping quote is not needed.
"Oh you looked good wearing that..." type of lines when someone takes something off.
Corrin makes this comment when someone reveals their small breasts. "Hi..." in this sentence is Hinoka, Corrin's older sister and also best Hoshido girl, fight me.
Corrin thinks of her hairband as her Lucky Charm. A character in FE:Fates, called Benny, makes Charms for people he likes, so it is a bit of a reference to him.
Referencing the "Dragon Looks in Mirror, Falls in Love w/Reflection" thing because it's cute.
Marks her specifically mentioning her necklace in 3-strip.
Responding to Neo's muteness.
Calls back on the "forgot" marker.
Calls back on the "fuckme" marker.
She mentions Odin, a character in Fire Emblem Fates.
Quote "It is just like the book said, "To win one does not need the best hand, simply not having the worst hand is enough to achieve victory." She shouldn't repeat this line.
Corrin is fine with losing a few rounds if she can help other players with it.
Corrin encourages the player to "play safer", as if that's possible in strip poker, but whatever, what does she know.
Referencing Rinkah's low hitrate in FE:Fates.
Speaks for itself. RIP Azura.
Quote "Small things count? That's nice to know!" When someone takes off a small thing.
"Small Penis Humiliation". Appearently some people are into that so yeah.
Strategy guides for Strip Poker are a thing, appearently.
At first, Corrin is surprised people have to masturbate in this game.
Followup to the "surmas" marker.
This line plays only after the game has gone on for quite a while after Corrin is finished.
Corrin was the commander (sort of) in a war, this war was the main plot point in FE:Fates.
Commenting on how warm it is in wherever they are playing.
Corrin thanks the player for inviting her to their table.
Korra's "Bending" is not something Corrin is familiar with.
Responding to corrin_m's presence. "Gods, I wasn't prepared for this"
One of Corrin's more memorable battle quotes, also a taunt in Smash 4.
Reacting to zone-tan's markers.
